Class EntityController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.EntityController

  • public class EntityController
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores information and method related to items and enemies

      • checkItem

        public void checkItem(Player player,
                      SoundHandler sh)
        Checks if the player is standing on a item. Add the item if an item collision has occurred.
        Parameters:
        player - The Player object for position reference.
        sh - The soundHandler used to play certain sounds on certain events.

        dir - the direction the enemy is travelling in
        Returns:

      • enemyCollision

        public boolean enemyCollision(Player player)
        Checks whether a player has collided with an enemy.
        Parameters:
        player - The player object where the position will be checked in the entityGrid.
        Returns:
        True if the player has collided with an enemy. False otherwise.

      • moveEnemies

        public void moveEnemies(MapController map,
                        EntityController ec)
        Iterates through each enemy and moves them to their next position.
        Parameters:
        map - the map will be passed through to each enemy to assist their
        ec - The entityCotnroller used to set the entityGrid position of the enemy to null.

        y - the y ordinate to look at
        Returns:

      • export

        public java.lang.String[] export()
        Returns an array of Strings of the state of the entities in the game.
        Returns:
        String array, 1 for each entity defining their details.

                              Player p)
        create an enemy using a text line from a map file

      • makeItem

                            int y,
                            char c)
        Returns a new item based on the char in the map text file
        Parameters:
        x - the x position of the item
        y - the y position of the item
        c - the character in the map file
        Returns:
